body:
Create package for the Fortran package manager ([fpm](https://github.com/fortran-lang/fpm)).

The fpm build process requires a bootstrap step since fpm is built with itself. The bootstrapping process is done by

1. acquiring a single file version of fpm (curl)
2. compiling this single file version to a bootstrap binary with reduced capabilities (FC)
3. use this bootstrap binary to build the actual fpm version (FC + CC)

This functionality is provided by the `install.sh` script in the fpm source tarball.
title: New package: Fortran package manager (fpm)
